metadata.subject: Fwd: Public work vs private AMAZING

analysis.purpose: To forward politically charged content comparing healthcare systems and criticizing the Obama administration's lack of private sector experience
analysis.significance: Shows dissemination of political propaganda through email chains among business professionals

notable_quotes: This helps to explain the incompetence of this administration: only 8% of them have ever worked in private business!
Pass this on because we'll NEVER see these facts in the main stream media.
red_flags: Call to action to spread content

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found

illegal_activity.description: Document contains forwarded political content/news article, not first-hand illegal activity

details: Mention that facts won't be seen in 'main stream media'

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be common political propaganda/chain email content circulating in 2012 criticizing the Obama administration

analysis.summary: Faith Kates forwards an email chain containing politically charged content comparing healthcare statistics between the US, England, and Canada, followed by criticism of the Obama administration for having only 8% of cabinet members with private sector experience. The email urges recipients to pass on the information.
